Name: Miracle field
About the game: This is an experience game In the game, you will play a little kirky. Experience the course of kirky's growth. You talk about playing kirky, learning to jump, eat, fall on the ground and so on. This is a simple and relaxing game, your goal is to experience the life of little kirky.
